content.h2: The road we have walked so far.
content.l1: The idea sprouts in a coffee shop by our two founding members.
content.l2: Results in establishment of Athena’s first office in the basement of our Gurgaon home.

content.h2: The road we have walked so far.
content.l1: The Athena logo is designed and pamphlets are distributed to different schools.

content.h2: The road we have walked so far.
content.l1: We host our first graduation banquet as we bid farewell to Athena’s batch of ‘16
content.l2: 31 students and our first team members were hired

content.h2: The road we have walked so far.
content.l1: We reach another milestone with our batch of 49 students.

content.h2: The road we have walked so far.
content.l1: We move to the 5th floor of Vatika Triangle—our first center and begin hosting scholars for Academies and essay editing.
content.l2: 39 students with our first team of counselors

content.h2: The road we have walked so far.
content.l1: We enroll our first set of 9th graders as part of the Ivy Strategy Program and hold a sporty send-off for our graduates

content.h2: The road we have walked so far.
content.l1: We welcome Research, Arts, and Tech consultants to the Athena Family
content.l2: 36 students and a strong team of 10+ employees

content.h2: The road we have walked so far.
content.l1: We build teams of Creative, Research, and Tech mentors, and welcome a Harvard Admissions Committee member
content.l2: 56 students with a growing team of 30+ employees

content.h2: The road we have walked so far.
content.l1: We expand our national presence with centers in Mumbai and Bangalore.
content.l2: Introduce the Athena Knowledge Center and skill-based Academies for 360-degree immersive learning.
